title: Rise Up
description:
Victoria Rocha, Manolo Matos, Andrea Coleman and Melissa Bond share stories about phone sex, family secrets, virginity lost and radiant boys.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Victoria Rocha, Manolo Matos, Andrea Coleman, Melissa Bond, The Police, Art Blakey & The Jazz Messengers, Kevin Allison, Stevie Wonder, Olivia Oyama)
